p: For mapping purposes, homesteads and slaughterhouse were considered positive if one or more inhabitants/workers were seropositive for RVFV. The spatial scan statistic was used to determine if there was any evidence of clustering of the RVFV seropositive homesteads [ 33]. A Bernoulli model was used with 999 iterations in SatScan version 9.0 ( www.satscan.org).
